abstract: Irwin D. Simon, chief of the Hain Celestial Group, says that treating people right will make them want to be a part of your team.
snippet: Irwin D. Simon, chief of the Hain Celestial Group, says that treating people right will make them want to be a part of your team.
lead_paragraph: This interview with  Irwin D. Simon, chairman, president and C.E.O. of the Hain Celestial Group, the natural and organic food and personal care products company, was conducted and condensed by  Adam Bryant.

headline.main: All Are Welcome at His Meetings. (That Means Interns, Too.)
headline.print_headline:
All Are Welcome
At His Meetings.
(That Means
Interns, Too.)
